<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A value indicating an infinite flow/capacity/weight of a block/edge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Not using numeric&#95;limits&lt;int64&#95;t&gt;::max(), as the values can be summed up</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// during the execution.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/#a001dbf74fedb2ab9b6f541f6943dea14"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/#a001dbf74fedb2ab9b6f541f6943dea14">INF</a> = ((int64&#95;t)1) &lt;&lt; 50;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The minimum-cost maximum flow algorithm.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The algorithm finds the maximum flow of minimum cost on a given (directed)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// network using a modified version of the classical Moore-Bellman-Ford</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// approach. The algorithm applies a number of augmentation iterations in which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// flow is sent along paths of positive capacity from the source to the sink.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The worst-case time complexity of the implementation is O(v(f)&#42;m&#42;n), where</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// where m is the number of edges, n is the number of vertices, and v(f) is the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// value of the maximum flow. However, the observed running time on typical</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// instances is sub-quadratic, that is, o(n^2).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The input is a set of edges with specified costs and capacities, and a pair</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// of nodes (source and sink). The output is the flow along each edge of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// minimum total cost respecting the given edge capacities.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#a246fc8776a1383f88a74fad1a98450fb">MinCostMaxFlow</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Initialize algorithm&#39;s data structures for a network of a given size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#acbf43214acfd3c95a6e28d1db4989d91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#acbf43214acfd3c95a6e28d1db4989d91">initialize</a>(uint64&#95;t NodeCount, uint64&#95;t SourceNode, uint64&#95;t SinkNode) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Source = SourceNode;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Target = SinkNode;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Nodes = std::vector&lt;Node&gt;(NodeCount);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Edges = std::vector&lt;std::vector&lt;Edge&gt;&gt;(NodeCount, std::vector&lt;Edge&gt;());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Params.EvenFlowDistribution)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">      AugmentingEdges =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">          std::vector&lt;std::vector&lt;Edge &#42;&gt;&gt;(NodeCount, std::vector&lt;Edge &#42;&gt;());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Run the algorithm.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#a523a13976e6717de53ffbcc67d521617"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#a523a13976e6717de53ffbcc67d521617">run</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Starting profi for &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; Nodes.size() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; nodes\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Iteratively find an augmentation path/dag in the network and send the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// flow along its edges</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the total flow and its cost</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t TotalCost = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t TotalFlow = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (uint64&#95;t Src = 0; Src &lt; Nodes.size(); Src++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Edge : Edges&#91;Src&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Edge.Flow &gt; 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">          TotalCost += Edge.Cost &#42; Edge.Flow;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Src == Source)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">            TotalFlow += Edge.Flow;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Completed profi after &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; AugmentationIters</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; iterations with &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; TotalFlow &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; total flow&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; of &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; TotalCost &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; cost\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Adding an edge to the network with a specified capacity and a cost.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Src != Dst &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;loop edge are not supported&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Edge SrcEdge;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SrcEdge.Dst = Dst;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SrcEdge.Cost = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SrcEdge.Capacity = Capacity;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SrcEdge.Flow = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SrcEdge.RevEdgeIndex = Edges&#91;Dst&#93;.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Edge DstEdge;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">    DstEdge.Dst = Src;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">    DstEdge.Cost = -<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">    DstEdge.Capacity = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">    DstEdge.Flow = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">    DstEdge.RevEdgeIndex = Edges&#91;Src&#93;.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Edges&#91;Src&#93;.push&#95;back(SrcEdge);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Edges&#91;Dst&#93;.push&#95;back(DstEdge);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Edge : Edges&#91;Src&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Get the total flow between a pair of nodes.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/siannotatecontrolflow-cpp/#acf797fa91d5b7065dfb68a2492df28c1">Flow</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Edge : Edges&#91;Src&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Edge.Dst == Dst) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/siannotatecontrolflow-cpp/#acf797fa91d5b7065dfb68a2492df28c1">Flow</a> += Edge.Flow;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
