<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Iteratively find an augmentation path/dag in the network and send the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// flow along its edges. The method returns the number of applied iterations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> applyFlowAugmentation() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AugmentationIters = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (findAugmentingPath()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint64&#95;t PathCapacity = computeAugmentingPathCapacity();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PathCapacity &gt; 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Progress = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Params.EvenFlowDistribution) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Identify node/edge candidates for augmentation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">          identifyShortestEdges(PathCapacity);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find an augmenting DAG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AugmentingOrder = findAugmentingDAG();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Apply the DAG augmentation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Progress = augmentFlowAlongDAG(AugmentingOrder);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">          PathCapacity = computeAugmentingPathCapacity();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Progress) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">          augmentFlowAlongPath(PathCapacity);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">          PathCapacity = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">        AugmentationIters++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AugmentationIters;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Compute the capacity of the cannonical augmenting path. If the path is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// saturated (that is, no flow can be sent along the path), then return 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t computeAugmentingPathCapacity() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t PathCapacity = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a12c2040f25d8e3a7b9e1c2024c618cb6">INF</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t Now = Target;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Now != Source) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint64&#95;t Pred = Nodes&#91;Now&#93;.ParentNode;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Edge = Edges&#91;Pred&#93;&#91;Nodes&#91;Now&#93;.ParentEdgeIndex&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Edge.Capacity &gt;= Edge.Flow &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;incorrect edge flow&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint64&#95;t EdgeCapacity = uint64&#95;t(Edge.Capacity - Edge.Flow);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PathCapacity = std::min(PathCapacity, EdgeCapacity);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Now = Pred;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PathCapacity;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Check for existence of an augmenting path with a positive capacity.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> findAugmentingPath() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Initialize data structures</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Node : Nodes) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Node.Distance = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a12c2040f25d8e3a7b9e1c2024c618cb6">INF</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Node.ParentNode = uint64&#95;t(-1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Node.ParentEdgeIndex = uint64&#95;t(-1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Node.Taken = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::queue&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.push(Source);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Nodes&#91;Source&#93;.Distance = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Nodes&#91;Source&#93;.Taken = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.front();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.pop();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.Taken = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Although the residual network contains edges with negative costs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (in particular, backward edges), it can be shown that there are no</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// negative-weight cycles and the following two invariants are maintained:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (i) Dist&#91;Source, V&#93; &gt;= 0 and (ii) Dist&#91;V, Target&#93; &gt;= 0 for all nodes V,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// where Dist is the length of the shortest path between two nodes. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// allows to prune the search-space of the path-finding algorithm using</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the following early-stop criteria:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -- If we find a path with zero-distance from Source to Target, stop the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    search, as the path is the shortest since Dist&#91;Source, Target&#93; &gt;= 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -- If we have Dist&#91;Source, V&#93; &gt; Dist&#91;Source, Target&#93;, then do not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    process node V, as it is guaranteed &#95;not&#95; to be on a shortest path</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    from Source to Target; it follows from inequalities</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Dist&#91;Source, Target&#93; &gt;= Dist&#91;Source, V&#93; + Dist&#91;V, Target&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                         &gt;= Dist&#91;Source, V&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Params.EvenFlowDistribution &amp;&amp; Nodes&#91;Target&#93;.Distance == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Nodes&#91;Src&#93;.Distance &gt; Nodes&#91;Target&#93;.Distance)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Process adjacent edges</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (uint64&#95;t EdgeIdx = 0; EdgeIdx &lt; Edges&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.size(); EdgeIdx++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Edge = Edges&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;&#91;EdgeIdx&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Edge.Flow &lt; Edge.Capacity) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">          uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a> = Edge.Dst;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">          int64&#95;t NewDistance = Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.Distance + Edge.Cost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Nodes&#91;Dst&#93;.Distance &gt; NewDistance) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update the distance and the parent node/edge</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>&#93;.Distance = NewDistance;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>&#93;.ParentNode = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>&#93;.ParentEdgeIndex = EdgeIdx;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add the node to the queue, if it is not there yet</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Nodes&#91;Dst&#93;.Taken) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">              <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.push(Dst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">              Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>&#93;.Taken = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">            &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Nodes&#91;Target&#93;.Distance != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a12c2040f25d8e3a7b9e1c2024c618cb6">INF</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Update the current flow along the augmenting path.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> augmentFlowAlongPath(uint64&#95;t PathCapacity) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(PathCapacity &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;found an incorrect augmenting path&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t Now = Target;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Now != Source) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint64&#95;t Pred = Nodes&#91;Now&#93;.ParentNode;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Edge = Edges&#91;Pred&#93;&#91;Nodes&#91;Now&#93;.ParentEdgeIndex&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;RevEdge = Edges&#91;Now&#93;&#91;Edge.RevEdgeIndex&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Edge.Flow += PathCapacity;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RevEdge.Flow -= PathCapacity;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Now = Pred;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Find an Augmenting DAG order using a modified version of DFS in which we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// can visit a node multiple times. In the DFS search, when scanning each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// edge out of a node, continue search at Edge.Dst endpoint if it has not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// been discovered yet and its NumCalls &lt; MaxDfsCalls. The algorithm</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// runs in O(MaxDfsCalls &#42; |Edges| + |Nodes|) time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// It returns an Augmenting Order (Taken nodes in decreasing Finish time)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// that starts with Source and ends with Target.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; findAugmentingDAG() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We use a stack based implemenation of DFS to avoid recursion.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Defining DFS data structures:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A pair (NodeIdx, EdgeIdx) at the top of the Stack denotes that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  - we are currently visiting Nodes&#91;NodeIdx&#93; and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  - the next edge to scan is Edges&#91;NodeIdx&#93;&#91;EdgeIdx&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typedef</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::pair&lt;uint64&#95;t, uint64&#95;t&gt; StackItemType;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::stack&lt;StackItemType&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a0d3b0002f320808a94594a6718946d7ba2187e1021a911b3807cc1bea2eb1a9ca">Stack</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::vector&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; AugmentingOrder;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Phase 0: Initialize Node attributes and Time for DFS run</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Node : Nodes) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Node.Discovery = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Node.Finish = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Node.NumCalls = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Node.Taken = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t Time = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mark Target as Taken</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Taken attribute will be propagated backwards from Target towards Source</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Nodes&#91;Target&#93;.Taken = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Phase 1: Start DFS traversal from Source</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a0d3b0002f320808a94594a6718946d7ba2187e1021a911b3807cc1bea2eb1a9ca">Stack</a>.emplace(Source, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Nodes&#91;Source&#93;.Discovery = ++Time;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a0d3b0002f320808a94594a6718946d7ba2187e1021a911b3807cc1bea2eb1a9ca">Stack</a>.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NodeIdx = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a0d3b0002f320808a94594a6718946d7ba2187e1021a911b3807cc1bea2eb1a9ca">Stack</a>.top().first;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EdgeIdx = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a0d3b0002f320808a94594a6718946d7ba2187e1021a911b3807cc1bea2eb1a9ca">Stack</a>.top().second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we haven&#39;t scanned all edges out of NodeIdx, continue scanning</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (EdgeIdx &lt; Edges&#91;NodeIdx&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Edge = Edges&#91;NodeIdx&#93;&#91;EdgeIdx&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a> = Nodes&#91;Edge.Dst&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a0d3b0002f320808a94594a6718946d7ba2187e1021a911b3807cc1bea2eb1a9ca">Stack</a>.top().second++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Edge.OnShortestPath) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we haven&#39;t seen Edge.Dst so far, continue DFS search there</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>.Discovery == 0 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>.NumCalls &lt; MaxDfsCalls) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>.Discovery = ++Time;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a0d3b0002f320808a94594a6718946d7ba2187e1021a911b3807cc1bea2eb1a9ca">Stack</a>.emplace(Edge.Dst, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>.NumCalls++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>.Taken &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>.Finish != 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Else, if Edge.Dst already have a path to Target, so that NodeIdx</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Nodes&#91;NodeIdx&#93;.Taken = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we are done scanning all edge out of NodeIdx</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a0d3b0002f320808a94594a6718946d7ba2187e1021a911b3807cc1bea2eb1a9ca">Stack</a>.pop();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we haven&#39;t found a path from NodeIdx to Target, forget about it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Nodes&#91;NodeIdx&#93;.Taken) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Nodes&#91;NodeIdx&#93;.Discovery = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we have found a path from NodeIdx to Target, then finish NodeIdx</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and propagate Taken flag to DFS parent unless at the Source</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Nodes&#91;NodeIdx&#93;.Finish = ++Time;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NodeIdx == Source if and only if the stack is empty</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NodeIdx != Source) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a0d3b0002f320808a94594a6718946d7ba2187e1021a911b3807cc1bea2eb1a9ca">Stack</a>.empty() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;empty stack while running dfs&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a0d3b0002f320808a94594a6718946d7ba2187e1021a911b3807cc1bea2eb1a9ca">Stack</a>.top().first&#93;.Taken = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">          AugmentingOrder.push&#95;back(NodeIdx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Nodes are collected decreasing Finish time, so the order is reversed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::reverse(AugmentingOrder.begin(), AugmentingOrder.end());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Phase 2: Extract all forward (DAG) edges and fill in AugmentingEdges</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Src : AugmentingOrder) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">      AugmentingEdges&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Edge : Edges&#91;Src&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">        uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a> = Edge.Dst;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Edge.OnShortestPath &amp;&amp; Nodes&#91;Src&#93;.Taken &amp;&amp; Nodes&#91;Dst&#93;.Taken &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Nodes&#91;Dst&#93;.Finish &lt; Nodes&#91;Src&#93;.Finish) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">          AugmentingEdges&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.push&#95;back(&amp;Edge);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((Src == Target || !AugmentingEdges&#91;Src&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a0e9cf49b789ff0825ffea99d23afd013">empty</a>()) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;incorrectly constructed augmenting edges&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AugmentingOrder;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Update the current flow along the given (acyclic) subgraph specified by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the vertex order, AugmentingOrder. The objective is to send as much flow</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// as possible while evenly distributing flow among successors of each node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// After the update at least one edge is saturated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> augmentFlowAlongDAG(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::vector&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; &amp;AugmentingOrder) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Phase 0: Initialization</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (uint64&#95;t Src : AugmentingOrder) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.FracFlow = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.IntFlow = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Edge : AugmentingEdges&#91;Src&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Edge-&gt;AugmentedFlow = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Phase 1: Send a unit of fractional flow along the DAG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t MaxFlowAmount = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a12c2040f25d8e3a7b9e1c2024c618cb6">INF</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Nodes&#91;Source&#93;.FracFlow = 1.0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (uint64&#95;t Src : AugmentingOrder) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((Src == Target || Nodes&#91;Src&#93;.FracFlow &gt; 0.0) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;incorrectly computed fractional flow&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Distribute flow evenly among successors of Src</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint64&#95;t Degree = AugmentingEdges&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Edge : AugmentingEdges&#91;Src&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">double</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EdgeFlow = Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.FracFlow / Degree;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Nodes&#91;Edge-&gt;Dst&#93;.FracFlow += EdgeFlow;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Edge-&gt;Capacity == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a12c2040f25d8e3a7b9e1c2024c618cb6">INF</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlight">        uint64&#95;t MaxIntFlow = double(Edge-&gt;Capacity - Edge-&gt;Flow) / EdgeFlow;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">        MaxFlowAmount = std::min(MaxFlowAmount, MaxIntFlow);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Stop early if we cannot send any (integral) flow from Source to Target</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MaxFlowAmount == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Phase 2: Send an integral flow of MaxFlowAmount</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Nodes&#91;Source&#93;.IntFlow = MaxFlowAmount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (uint64&#95;t Src : AugmentingOrder) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Src == Target)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Distribute flow evenly among successors of Src, rounding up to make</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sure all flow is sent</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint64&#95;t Degree = AugmentingEdges&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We are guaranteeed that Node&#91;Src&#93;.IntFlow &lt;= SuccFlow &#42; Degree</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint64&#95;t SuccFlow = (Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.IntFlow + Degree - 1) / Degree;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Edge : AugmentingEdges&#91;Src&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">        uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a> = Edge-&gt;Dst;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlight">        uint64&#95;t EdgeFlow = std::min(Nodes&#91;Src&#93;.IntFlow, SuccFlow);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlight">        EdgeFlow = std::min(EdgeFlow, uint64&#95;t(Edge-&gt;Capacity - Edge-&gt;Flow));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>&#93;.IntFlow += EdgeFlow;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.IntFlow -= EdgeFlow;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Edge-&gt;AugmentedFlow += EdgeFlow;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Nodes&#91;Target&#93;.IntFlow &lt;= MaxFlowAmount);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Nodes&#91;Target&#93;.IntFlow = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Phase 3: Send excess flow back traversing the nodes backwards.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Because of rounding, not all flow can be sent along the edges of Src.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Hence, sending the remaining flow back to maintain flow conservation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Idx = AugmentingOrder.size() - 1; Idx &gt; 0; Idx--) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a> = AugmentingOrder&#91;Idx - 1&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to send excess flow back along each edge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure we only send back flow we just augmented (AugmentedFlow).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Edge : AugmentingEdges&#91;Src&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlight">        uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a> = Edge-&gt;Dst;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Nodes&#91;Dst&#93;.IntFlow == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlight">        uint64&#95;t EdgeFlow = std::min(Nodes&#91;Dst&#93;.IntFlow, Edge-&gt;AugmentedFlow);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>&#93;.IntFlow -= EdgeFlow;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.IntFlow += EdgeFlow;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Edge-&gt;AugmentedFlow -= EdgeFlow;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Phase 4: Update flow values along all edges</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasSaturatedEdges = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (uint64&#95;t Src : AugmentingOrder) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Verify that we have sent all the excess flow from the node</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Src == Source || Nodes&#91;Src&#93;.IntFlow == 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Edge : AugmentingEdges&#91;Src&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(uint64&#95;t(Edge-&gt;Capacity - Edge-&gt;Flow) &gt;= Edge-&gt;AugmentedFlow);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update flow values along the edge and its reverse copy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;RevEdge = Edges&#91;Edge-&gt;Dst&#93;&#91;Edge-&gt;RevEdgeIndex&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Edge-&gt;Flow += Edge-&gt;AugmentedFlow;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlight">        RevEdge.Flow -= Edge-&gt;AugmentedFlow;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Edge-&gt;Capacity == Edge-&gt;Flow &amp;&amp; Edge-&gt;AugmentedFlow &gt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlight">          HasSaturatedEdges = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The augmentation is successful iff at least one edge becomes saturated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasSaturatedEdges;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Identify candidate (shortest) edges for augmentation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> identifyShortestEdges(uint64&#95;t PathCapacity) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(PathCapacity &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;found an incorrect augmenting DAG&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To make sure the augmentation DAG contains only edges with large residual</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// capacity, we prune all edges whose capacity is below a fraction of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the capacity of the augmented path.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (All edges of the path itself are always in the DAG)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t MinCapacity = std::max(PathCapacity / 2, uint64&#95;t(1));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Decide which edges are on a shortest path from Source to Target</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Src = 0; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a> &lt; Nodes.size(); <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// An edge cannot be augmenting if the endpoint has large distance</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Nodes&#91;Src&#93;.Distance &gt; Nodes&#91;Target&#93;.Distance)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Edge : Edges&#91;Src&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlight">        uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a> = Edge.Dst;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Edge.OnShortestPath =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a> != Target &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a> != Source &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>&#93;.Distance &lt;= Nodes&#91;Target&#93;.Distance &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>&#93;.Distance == Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;.Distance + Edge.Cost &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Edge.Capacity &gt; Edge.Flow &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight">            uint64&#95;t(Edge.Capacity - Edge.Flow) &gt;= MinCapacity;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Maximum number of DFS iterations for DAG finding.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t MaxDfsCalls = 10;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A node in a flow network.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">Node &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The cost of the cheapest path from the source to the current node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t Distance;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The node preceding the current one in the path.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t ParentNode;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The index of the edge between ParentNode and the current node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t ParentEdgeIndex;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// An indicator of whether the current node is in a queue.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Taken;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Data fields utilized in DAG-augmentation:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Fractional flow.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">double</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FracFlow;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Integral flow.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t IntFlow;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Discovery time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t Discovery;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Finish time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t Finish;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// NumCalls.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t NumCalls;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// An edge in a flow network.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">Edge &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The cost of the edge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t Cost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The capacity of the edge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t Capacity;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The current flow on the edge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t Flow;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The destination node of the edge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t Dst;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The index of the reverse edge between Dst and the current node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t RevEdgeIndex;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Data fields utilized in DAG-augmentation:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Whether the edge is currently on a shortest path from Source to Target.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OnShortestPath;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Extra flow along the edge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t AugmentedFlow;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The set of network nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;Node&gt; Nodes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The set of network edges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;std::vector&lt;Edge&gt;&gt; Edges;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Source node of the flow.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t Source;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Target (sink) node of the flow.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t Target;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Augmenting edges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;std::vector&lt;Edge &#42;&gt;&gt; AugmentingEdges;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Params for flow computation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ProfiParams &amp;Params;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A post-processing adjustment of the control flow. It applies two steps by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// rerouting some flow and making it more realistic:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - First, it removes all isolated components (&quot;islands&quot;) with a positive flow</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   that are unreachable from the entry block. For every such component, we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   find the shortest from the entry to an exit passing through the component,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   and increase the flow by one unit along the path.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - Second, it identifies all &quot;unknown subgraphs&quot; consisting of basic blocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   with no sampled counts. Then it rebalnces the flow that goes through such</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   a subgraph so that each branch is taken with probability 50%.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   An unknown subgraph is such that for every two nodes u and v:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     - u dominates v and u is not unknown;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     - v post-dominates u; and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     - all inner-nodes of all (u,v)-paths are unknown.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/flowadjuster"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/flowadjuster/#ad04ad58c6ccb8efe2be143e1bf61dd3c">FlowAdjuster</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Find the shortest path from the entry block to an exit block passing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// through a given block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;FlowJump &#42;&gt; findShortestPath(uint64&#95;t BlockIdx) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A path from the entry block to BlockIdx</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ForwardPath = findShortestPath(Func.Entry, BlockIdx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A path from BlockIdx to an exit block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BackwardPath = findShortestPath(BlockIdx, AnyExitBlock);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::vector&lt;FlowJump &#42;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>;</span></CodeLine>
