<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>.insert(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>.end(), BackwardPath.begin(), BackwardPath.end());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Apply the Dijkstra algorithm to find the shortest path from a given</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Source to a given Target block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If Target == -1, then the path ends at an exit block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;FlowJump &#42;&gt; findShortestPath(uint64&#95;t Source, uint64&#95;t Target) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Quit early, if possible</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Source == Target)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::vector&lt;FlowJump &#42;&gt;();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Func.Blocks&#91;Source&#93;.isExit() &amp;&amp; Target == AnyExitBlock)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::vector&lt;FlowJump &#42;&gt;();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Initialize data structures</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Distance = std::vector&lt;int64&#95;t&gt;(NumBlocks(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a12c2040f25d8e3a7b9e1c2024c618cb6">INF</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Parent = std::vector&lt;FlowJump &#42;&gt;(NumBlocks(), </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Distance&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sched/#ab8d854a5ce2331586bcc6830cca52f0fac13545a6345c7d5b3c9cc8932ad3b0e9">Source</a>&#93; = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::set&lt;std::pair&lt;uint64&#95;t, uint64&#95;t&gt;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.insert(std::make&#95;pair(Distance&#91;Source&#93;, Source));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Run the Dijkstra algorithm</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.begin()-&gt;second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.erase(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.begin());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we found a solution, quit early</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Src == Target ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><span class="doxyHighlight">          (Func.Blocks&#91;Src&#93;.isExit() &amp;&amp; Target == AnyExitBlock))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Jump : Func.Blocks&#91;Src&#93;.SuccJumps) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><span class="doxyHighlight">        uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a> = Jump-&gt;Target;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><span class="doxyHighlight">        int64&#95;t JumpDist = jumpDistance(Jump);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Distance&#91;Dst&#93; &gt; Distance&#91;Src&#93; + JumpDist) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.erase(std::make&#95;pair(Distance&#91;Dst&#93;, Dst));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Distance&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>&#93; = Distance&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93; + JumpDist;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Parent&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>&#93; = Jump;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.insert(std::make&#95;pair(Distance&#91;Dst&#93;, Dst));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If Target is not provided, find the closest exit block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Target == AnyExitBlock) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; NumBlocks(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Func.Blocks&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;.isExit() &amp;&amp; Parent&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Target == AnyExitBlock || Distance&#91;Target&#93; &gt; Distance&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/exp/#af7592dc94276d1958420bcfb414b6998">Target</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Parent&#91;Target&#93; != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;a path does not exist&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Extract the constructed path</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::vector&lt;FlowJump &#42;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t Now = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/exp/#af7592dc94276d1958420bcfb414b6998">Target</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Now != Source) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Now == Parent&#91;Now&#93;-&gt;Target &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;incorrect parent jump&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>.push&#95;back(Parent&#91;Now&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Now = Parent&#91;Now&#93;-&gt;Source;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Reverse the path, since it is extracted from Target to Source</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::reverse(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>.begin(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>.end());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A distance of a path for a given jump.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// In order to incite the path to use blocks/jumps with large positive flow,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// and avoid changing branch probability of outgoing edges drastically,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// set the jump distance so as:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   - to minimize the number of unlikely jumps used and subject to that,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   - to minimize the number of Flow == 0 jumps used and subject to that,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   - minimizes total multiplicative Flow increase for the remaining edges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// To capture this objective with integer distances, we round off fractional</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// parts to a multiple of 1 / BaseDistance.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t jumpDistance(FlowJump &#42;Jump)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Jump-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#a061ed8974c636291de7f7cf5c76e4660">IsUnlikely</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Params.CostUnlikely;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t BaseDistance =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><span class="doxyHighlight">        std::max(FlowAdjuster::MinBaseDistance,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 std::min(Func.Blocks&#91;Func.Entry&#93;.Flow,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          Params.CostUnlikely / (2 &#42; (NumBlocks() + 1))));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Jump-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#aba9bc6e5c52dfa0898860eeadbbef59b">Flow</a> &gt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BaseDistance + BaseDistance / Jump-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#aba9bc6e5c52dfa0898860eeadbbef59b">Flow</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 2 &#42; BaseDistance &#42; (NumBlocks() + 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t NumBlocks()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Func.Blocks.size(); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Rebalance unknown subgraphs so that the flow is split evenly across the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// outgoing branches of every block of the subgraph. The method iterates over</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// blocks with known weight and identifies unknown subgraphs rooted at the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// blocks. Then it verifies if flow rebalancing is feasible and applies it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> rebalanceUnknownSubgraphs() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to find unknown subgraphs from each block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FlowBlock &amp;SrcBlock : Func.Blocks) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Verify if rebalancing rooted at SrcBlock is feasible</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!canRebalanceAtRoot(&amp;SrcBlock))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find an unknown subgraphs starting at SrcBlock. Along the way,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fill in known destinations and intermediate unknown blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::vector&lt;FlowBlock &#42;&gt; UnknownBlocks;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::vector&lt;FlowBlock &#42;&gt; KnownDstBlocks;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><span class="doxyHighlight">      findUnknownSubgraph(&amp;SrcBlock, KnownDstBlocks, UnknownBlocks);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Verify if rebalancing of the subgraph is feasible. If the search is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// successful, find the unique destination block (which can be null)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><span class="doxyHighlight">      FlowBlock &#42;DstBlock = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!canRebalanceSubgraph(&amp;SrcBlock, KnownDstBlocks, UnknownBlocks,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                DstBlock))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We cannot rebalance subgraphs containing cycles among unknown blocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!isAcyclicSubgraph(&amp;SrcBlock, DstBlock, UnknownBlocks))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Rebalance the flow</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><span class="doxyHighlight">      rebalanceUnknownSubgraph(&amp;SrcBlock, DstBlock, UnknownBlocks);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="797"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Verify if rebalancing rooted at a given block is possible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> canRebalanceAtRoot(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FlowBlock &#42;SrcBlock) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not attempt to find unknown subgraphs from an unknown or a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// zero-flow block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowblock/#aac571aba0964e18080de57124d2f9866">HasUnknownWeight</a> || SrcBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowblock/#a5204b5e55328f7a80fce9423c4cee8c1">Flow</a> == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not attempt to process subgraphs from a block w/o unknown sucessors</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasUnknownSuccs = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Jump : SrcBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowblock/#ab471dfaaaa5b8d4801330067baab383e">SuccJumps</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Func.Blocks&#91;Jump-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#aa017ffa5be8016e6feb941ceae7c89cc">Target</a>&#93;.HasUnknownWeight) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><span class="doxyHighlight">        HasUnknownSuccs = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!HasUnknownSuccs)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="816"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="817"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="818"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="821"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Find an unknown subgraph starting at block SrcBlock. The method sets</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// identified destinations, KnownDstBlocks, and intermediate UnknownBlocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="823"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> findUnknownSubgraph(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FlowBlock &#42;SrcBlock,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="824"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           std::vector&lt;FlowBlock &#42;&gt; &amp;KnownDstBlocks,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="825"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           std::vector&lt;FlowBlock &#42;&gt; &amp;UnknownBlocks) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Run BFS from SrcBlock and make sure all paths are going through unknown</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="827"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// blocks and end at a known DstBlock</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Visited = BitVector(NumBlocks(), </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::queue&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="831"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.push(SrcBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowblock/#a13613f61cfca8d0f1a0f9a09f26353e0">Index</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="832"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Visited&#91;SrcBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowblock/#a13613f61cfca8d0f1a0f9a09f26353e0">Index</a>&#93; = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Process blocks reachable from Block</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="841"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="842"><span class="doxyHighlight">        uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a> = Jump-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#aa017ffa5be8016e6feb941ceae7c89cc">Target</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="843"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If Dst has been visited, skip Jump</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="844"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Visited&#91;Dst&#93;)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="846"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Process block Dst</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Verify if rebalancing of the subgraph is feasible. If the checks are</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> canRebalanceSubgraph(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FlowBlock &#42;SrcBlock,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="944"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.push(SrcBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowblock/#a13613f61cfca8d0f1a0f9a09f26353e0">Index</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="946"><span class="doxyHighlight">      FlowBlock &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a> = &amp;Func.Blocks&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.front()&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.pop();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="948"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Stop propagation once we reach DstBlock, if any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="949"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DstBlock != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a> == DstBlock)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="950"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="951"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Keep an acyclic order of unknown blocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>-&gt;HasUnknownWeight &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a> != SrcBlock)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="954"><span class="doxyHighlight">        AcyclicOrder.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="955"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="956"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add to the queue all successors with zero local in-degree</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="957"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Jump : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>-&gt;SuccJumps) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="958"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ignoreJump(SrcBlock, DstBlock, Jump))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="959"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="960"><span class="doxyHighlight">        uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a> = Jump-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#aa017ffa5be8016e6feb941ceae7c89cc">Target</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="961"><span class="doxyHighlight">        LocalInDegree&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>&#93;--;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="962"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LocalInDegree&#91;Dst&#93; == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="963"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.push(Dst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="964"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="965"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="966"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="967"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="968"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there is a cycle in the subgraph, AcyclicOrder contains only a subset</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="969"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of all blocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="970"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UnknownBlocks.size() != AcyclicOrder.size())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="971"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="972"><span class="doxyHighlight">    UnknownBlocks = AcyclicOrder;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="973"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="974"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="975"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="976"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Rebalance a given subgraph rooted at SrcBlock, ending at DstBlock and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="977"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// having UnknownBlocks intermediate blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="978"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> rebalanceUnknownSubgraph(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FlowBlock &#42;SrcBlock,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="979"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FlowBlock &#42;DstBlock,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="980"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::vector&lt;FlowBlock &#42;&gt; &amp;UnknownBlocks) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="981"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SrcBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowblock/#a5204b5e55328f7a80fce9423c4cee8c1">Flow</a> &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;zero-flow block in unknown subgraph&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="982"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="983"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ditribute flow from the source block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="984"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t BlockFlow = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="985"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SrcBlock&#39;s flow is the sum of outgoing flows along non-ignored jumps</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="986"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Jump : SrcBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowblock/#ab471dfaaaa5b8d4801330067baab383e">SuccJumps</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="987"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ignoreJump(SrcBlock, DstBlock, Jump))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="988"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="989"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BlockFlow += Jump-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#aba9bc6e5c52dfa0898860eeadbbef59b">Flow</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="990"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="991"><span class="doxyHighlight">    rebalanceBlock(SrcBlock, DstBlock, SrcBlock, BlockFlow);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="992"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="993"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ditribute flow from the remaining blocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="994"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a> : UnknownBlocks) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="995"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>-&gt;HasUnknownWeight &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;incorrect unknown subgraph&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="996"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint64&#95;t BlockFlow = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="997"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Block&#39;s flow is the sum of incoming flows</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="998"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Jump : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>-&gt;PredJumps) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="999"><span class="doxyHighlight">        BlockFlow += Jump-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#aba9bc6e5c52dfa0898860eeadbbef59b">Flow</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1000"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1001"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>-&gt;Flow = BlockFlow;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1002"><span class="doxyHighlight">      rebalanceBlock(SrcBlock, DstBlock, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>, BlockFlow);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1003"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1004"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1005"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1006"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Redistribute flow for a block in a subgraph rooted at SrcBlock,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1007"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// and ending at DstBlock.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1008"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> rebalanceBlock(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FlowBlock &#42;SrcBlock, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FlowBlock &#42;DstBlock,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1009"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FlowBlock &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>, uint64&#95;t BlockFlow) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1010"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Process all successor jumps and update corresponding flow values</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1011"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BlockDegree = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1012"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Jump : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>-&gt;SuccJumps) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1013"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ignoreJump(SrcBlock, DstBlock, Jump))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1014"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1015"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BlockDegree++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1016"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1017"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If all successor jumps of the block are ignored, skip it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1018"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DstBlock == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&amp; BlockDegree == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1019"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1020"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(BlockDegree &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;all outgoing jumps are ignored&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1021"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1022"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Each of the Block&#39;s successors gets the following amount of flow.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1023"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Rounding the value up so that all flow is propagated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1024"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t SuccFlow = (BlockFlow + BlockDegree - 1) / BlockDegree;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1025"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Jump : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>-&gt;SuccJumps) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1026"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ignoreJump(SrcBlock, DstBlock, Jump))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1027"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1028"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/siannotatecontrolflow-cpp/#acf797fa91d5b7065dfb68a2492df28c1">Flow</a> = std::min(SuccFlow, BlockFlow);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1029"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Jump-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#aba9bc6e5c52dfa0898860eeadbbef59b">Flow</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/siannotatecontrolflow-cpp/#acf797fa91d5b7065dfb68a2492df28c1">Flow</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1030"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BlockFlow -= <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/siannotatecontrolflow-cpp/#acf797fa91d5b7065dfb68a2492df28c1">Flow</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1031"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1032"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(BlockFlow == 0 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;not all flow is propagated&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1033"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1037"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Minimum BaseDistance for the jump distance values in island joining.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ProfiParams &amp;Params;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1042"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1043"><span class="doxyHighlight">  FlowFunction &amp;Func;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1044"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1045"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1046"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::pair&lt;int64&#95;t, int64&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/#ad129e295efcd7c789b6c5d67124adef8">assignBlockCosts</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams">ProfiParams</a> &amp;Params,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1047"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowblock">FlowBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::pair&lt;int64&#95;t, int64&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/#a1ce5cbe1af8289db9c7121774c7ea192">assignJumpCosts</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams">ProfiParams</a> &amp;Params,</span></CodeLine>
