<Link id="l01050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1050"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1051"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Initializing flow network for a given function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1052"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1053"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Every block is split into two nodes that are responsible for (i) an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1054"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// incoming flow, (ii) an outgoing flow; they penalize an increase or a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1055"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// reduction of the block weight.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1056" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/#a46dd2e73fdb4a5c9bf2af4a8fa968bd1"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/#a46dd2e73fdb4a5c9bf2af4a8fa968bd1">initializeNetwork</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams">ProfiParams</a> &amp;Params, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow">MinCostMaxFlow</a> &amp;Network,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1057"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowfunction">FlowFunction</a> &amp;Func) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1058"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t NumBlocks = Func.Blocks.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1059"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NumBlocks &gt; 1 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Too few blocks in a function&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1060"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t NumJumps = Func.Jumps.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1061"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NumJumps &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Too few jumps in a function&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Introducing dummy source/sink pairs to allow flow circulation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The nodes corresponding to blocks of the function have indices in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the range &#91;0 .. 2 &#42; NumBlocks); the dummy sources/sinks are indexed by the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// next four values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t S = 2 &#42; NumBlocks;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t T = S + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1069"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpulegalizerinfo-cpp/#a22eabd3566ae5f32cb6f594f4f343399">S1</a> = S + 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t T1 = S + 3;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1071"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1072"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Network.<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#acbf43214acfd3c95a6e28d1db4989d91">initialize</a>(2 &#42; NumBlocks + 4, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpulegalizerinfo-cpp/#a22eabd3566ae5f32cb6f594f4f343399">S1</a>, T1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1073"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1074"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Initialize nodes of the flow network</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1075"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> &lt; NumBlocks; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1076"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a> = Func.Blocks&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1077"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1078"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Split every block into two auxiliary nodes to allow</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1079"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// increase/reduction of the block count.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1080"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a372f87e2cac1c83389c98554dc44806da807dbe7d1c25a633894d4a231b1c76d3">Bin</a> = 2 &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1081"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t Bout = 2 &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1082"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1083"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Edges from S and to T</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1084"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>.isEntry()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1085"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Network.<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#a2945517bec92f190ee791baa19050289">addEdge</a>(S, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a372f87e2cac1c83389c98554dc44806da807dbe7d1c25a633894d4a231b1c76d3">Bin</a>, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1086"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>.isExit()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1087"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Network.<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#a2945517bec92f190ee791baa19050289">addEdge</a>(Bout, T, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1088"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1089"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1090"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Assign costs for increasing/decreasing the block counts</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1091"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#91;AuxCostInc, AuxCostDec&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/#ad129e295efcd7c789b6c5d67124adef8">assignBlockCosts</a>(Params, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1092"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1093"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add the corresponding edges to the network</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1094"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Network.<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#a2945517bec92f190ee791baa19050289">addEdge</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a372f87e2cac1c83389c98554dc44806da807dbe7d1c25a633894d4a231b1c76d3">Bin</a>, Bout, AuxCostInc);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1095"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>.Weight &gt; 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1096"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Network.<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#a2945517bec92f190ee791baa19050289">addEdge</a>(Bout, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a372f87e2cac1c83389c98554dc44806da807dbe7d1c25a633894d4a231b1c76d3">Bin</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>.Weight, AuxCostDec);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1097"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Network.<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#a2945517bec92f190ee791baa19050289">addEdge</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpulegalizerinfo-cpp/#a22eabd3566ae5f32cb6f594f4f343399">S1</a>, Bout, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>.Weight, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1098"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Network.<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#a2945517bec92f190ee791baa19050289">addEdge</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a372f87e2cac1c83389c98554dc44806da807dbe7d1c25a633894d4a231b1c76d3">Bin</a>, T1, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>.Weight, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1099"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1101"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Initialize edges of the flow network</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (uint64&#95;t J = 0; J &lt; NumJumps; J++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1104"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Jump = Func.Jumps&#91;J&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1105"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1106"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the endpoints corresponding to the jump</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1107"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t Jin = 2 &#42; Jump.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#ae9c91a5ea45940cfaa166511aadd2eb2">Source</a> + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1108"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t Jout = 2 &#42; Jump.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#aa017ffa5be8016e6feb941ceae7c89cc">Target</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1109"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1110"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Assign costs for increasing/decreasing the jump counts</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1111"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#91;AuxCostInc, AuxCostDec&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/#a1ce5cbe1af8289db9c7121774c7ea192">assignJumpCosts</a>(Params, Jump);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1112"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add the corresponding edges to the network</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1114"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Network.<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#a2945517bec92f190ee791baa19050289">addEdge</a>(Jin, Jout, AuxCostInc);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Jump.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#acdd34566a25bab9890d87c9de6e7e8b0">Weight</a> &gt; 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1116"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Network.<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#a2945517bec92f190ee791baa19050289">addEdge</a>(Jout, Jin, Jump.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#acdd34566a25bab9890d87c9de6e7e8b0">Weight</a>, AuxCostDec);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1117"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Network.<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#a2945517bec92f190ee791baa19050289">addEdge</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpulegalizerinfo-cpp/#a22eabd3566ae5f32cb6f594f4f343399">S1</a>, Jout, Jump.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#acdd34566a25bab9890d87c9de6e7e8b0">Weight</a>, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1118"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Network.<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#a2945517bec92f190ee791baa19050289">addEdge</a>(Jin, T1, Jump.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#acdd34566a25bab9890d87c9de6e7e8b0">Weight</a>, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1121"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure we have a valid flow circulation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Network.<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow/#a2945517bec92f190ee791baa19050289">addEdge</a>(T, S, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1124"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1125"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Assign costs for increasing/decreasing the block counts.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1127" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/#ad129e295efcd7c789b6c5d67124adef8"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::pair&lt;int64&#95;t, int64&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/#ad129e295efcd7c789b6c5d67124adef8">assignBlockCosts</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams">ProfiParams</a> &amp;Params,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1128"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowblock">FlowBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Modifying the weight of an unlikely block is expensive</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>.IsUnlikely)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1131"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::make&#95;pair(Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams/#a8c360b59499f427030ac3969086b5cb8">CostUnlikely</a>, Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams/#a8c360b59499f427030ac3969086b5cb8">CostUnlikely</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1132"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Assign default values for the costs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t CostInc = Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams/#a39401e9ddaa84e388f7114f9f3b77c7e">CostBlockInc</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t CostDec = Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams/#adcd8b45086bba7f4515e3e3d8fef41dc">CostBlockDec</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update the costs depending on the block metadata</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>.HasUnknownWeight) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CostInc = Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams/#ad0fab235dca463ec9d48c5b6bfe9ccde">CostBlockUnknownInc</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1139"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CostDec = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1141"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Increasing the count for &quot;cold&quot; blocks with zero initial count is more</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1142"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// expensive than for &quot;hot&quot; ones</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1143"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>.Weight == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1144"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CostInc = Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams/#a9e351546ca08436a0e7a7ccfa08f5495">CostBlockZeroInc</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1145"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Modifying the count of the entry block is expensive</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1146"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>.isEntry()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1147"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CostInc = Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams/#af820f5e80ca4cd2a823d4dbd16714bc1">CostBlockEntryInc</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1148"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CostDec = Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams/#aaa7f2d292f152d77537be66c67cd2008">CostBlockEntryDec</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1149"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::make&#95;pair(CostInc, CostDec);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1152"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1153"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Assign costs for increasing/decreasing the jump counts.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1155" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/#a1ce5cbe1af8289db9c7121774c7ea192"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::pair&lt;int64&#95;t, int64&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/#a1ce5cbe1af8289db9c7121774c7ea192">assignJumpCosts</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams">ProfiParams</a> &amp;Params,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1156"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump">FlowJump</a> &amp;Jump) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Modifying the weight of an unlikely jump is expensive</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Jump.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#a061ed8974c636291de7f7cf5c76e4660">IsUnlikely</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1159"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::make&#95;pair(Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams/#a8c360b59499f427030ac3969086b5cb8">CostUnlikely</a>, Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams/#a8c360b59499f427030ac3969086b5cb8">CostUnlikely</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1160"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Assign default values for the costs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t CostInc = Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams/#ac04da42f4440b9ea85d4ae6400b4e8ce">CostJumpInc</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t CostDec = Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams/#a94bec6d7c1e0827854d72091aacf81f7">CostJumpDec</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update the costs depending on the block metadata</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Jump.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#ae9c91a5ea45940cfaa166511aadd2eb2">Source</a> + 1 == Jump.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#aa017ffa5be8016e6feb941ceae7c89cc">Target</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Adjusting the fall-through branch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CostInc = Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams/#a55e432c2b9b6e25f5a83f1d5ac7655b7">CostJumpFTInc</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CostDec = Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams/#adb1dd7977642b5222b9fac44305f562e">CostJumpFTDec</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Jump.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#a491b58e7abf9b59f256a3c66443a1ad5">HasUnknownWeight</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1171"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The cost is different for fall-through and non-fall-through branches</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1172"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Jump.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#ae9c91a5ea45940cfaa166511aadd2eb2">Source</a> + 1 == Jump.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#aa017ffa5be8016e6feb941ceae7c89cc">Target</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1173"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CostInc = Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams/#a2aa4f0b714c6b54a55b97af255f6f62c">CostJumpUnknownFTInc</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1174"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1175"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CostInc = Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams/#acecc0d05ec41075cc30e0c9bbb0c20b9">CostJumpUnknownInc</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1176"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CostDec = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1178"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Jump.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowjump/#acdd34566a25bab9890d87c9de6e7e8b0">Weight</a> &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;found zero-weight jump with a positive weight&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::make&#95;pair(CostInc, CostDec);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1239"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
